StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetShipperData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ContractID as integer AS
SELECT S.SHIP_ID, dbo.FormatDate(S.SHIP_DATE, 106, SPACE(0)) AS SHIP_DATE, TR_ORG.[NAME], dbo.FormatDate(S.AFADBD, 106, SPACE(0)) AS AFADBD, dbo.FormatDate(S.PAY_ENTRY_BASE_DATE, 106, SPACE(0)) AS PAY_ENTRY_BASE_DATE, S.PAY_GRADE_CODE, dbo.FormatDate(S.PAY_GRADE_ED_DATE, 106, SPACE(0)) AS PAY_GRADE_ED_DATE, COALESCE(RT.DETECTABILITY_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS DETECTABILITY_CODE, dbo.FormatDate(RT.GRADUATION_DATE, 106, SPACE(0)) AS GRADUATION_DATE, COALESCE(RT.DROP_REASON, SPACE(0)) AS DISCHARGE_CODE, dbo.FormatDate(RT.DROP_DATE, 106, SPACE(0)) AS DISCHARGE_DATE, dbo.FormatDate(C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, 106, SPACE(0)) AS CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, COALESCE(S.COMPONENT_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS COMPONENT_CODE, S.TRAINING_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM SHIPPER S INNER JOIN TRAINING_ORGANIZATION TR_ORG ON S.TRAINING_ORGANIZATION_ID = TR_ORG.TRAINING_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN CONTRACT C ON S.CONTRACT_ID = C.CONTRACT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RECRUIT_TRAINING RT ON S.SHIP_ID = RT.SHIP_ID WHERE S.CONTRACT_ID = @ContractID
